metatags.twitter:title: Innovations in White Biotechnology and Bioplastics
metatags.og:title: Innovations in White Biotechnology and Bioplastics
metatags.og:description: IDTechEx Research Article: White biotechnology refers to the use of biological systems for the industrial production of bio-based products, aiming to reduce reliance on fossil fuels and lower the carbon footprint of materials. This article covers main feedstocks and the molecules made via white biotechnology.
